parameters.name: FromUnitId
parameters.description:
The ID of the source cost center.

*   A value of 0 indicates that the resources to be transferred have not been allocated to a cost center.
*   A value greater than 0 indicates the ID of an existing cost center.

parameters.name: FromUnitUserId
parameters.description: The user ID of the owner of the source cost center.

parameters.name: ResourceInstanceList
parameters.description: The resource instances to be transferred.

parameters.name: ToUnitId
parameters.description:
The ID of the destination cost center.

*   A value of -1 indicates that the allocated resources are changed to unallocated.
*   A value greater than 0 indicates the ID of an existing cost center.

parameters.name: ToUnitUserId
parameters.description: The user ID of the owner of the destination cost center.
